Class Player

java.lang.Object
com.groupNine.app.Entity
com.groupNine.app.Moving
com.groupNine.app.Player
public class Player extends Moving
Sets up the player for the user to control and use to win the game
Version:
1.0
Author:
Milo

  • Method Details

    • changeScore

      public void changeScore(int change)
      Changes the present score of the player
      Parameters:
      change - The amount of score to increase or decrease

    • setDefaultValues

      public void setDefaultValues()
      Sets the spawning location and beginning score of the player. Also records the initial time that the player class was called

    • getPlayerImage

      public void getPlayerImage()
      Sets all of the images that the player will use to portray movement

    • collisionHandler

      public void collisionHandler(String dir)
      Checks for any collision with rewards, special rewards, and punishments
      Parameters:
      dir - Direction player will be moving

    • update

      public void update()
      Checks for input from inputHandler, moves the player in that direction, and change the image of the player if needed

      Gets the present score of the player

      Draws the player onto the screen

    • touchingEndCell

      public boolean touchingEndCell()
      Checks if the player is touching the ending
      Returns:
      True if player touches the ending, False otherwise

    • getTime

      public int getTime()
      Calculates the total amount of time spent using the startTime
      Returns:
      Total amount of time spent

    • changeTime
